response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this opportunity, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $75. This exclusive offer is available only for a limited time, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information about the product, please let me know. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 75}
